ai-patthana16.94:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.94:0.3_0: for those who attack themselves, double-round, and hard forward to see the eyes,
ai-patthana16.94:1.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, not for the sake of non-offering the supreme condition.
ai-patthana16.94:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana16.94:2.1_0: One who has not gone for refuge to the unsurpassed hearing of what is unsurpassable; for the sake of this is not give rise to the supreme cause or condition.
